file_content.text: Always a pleasure to see you. I trust you find my merchandise to your satisfaction?
I am grateful we could come to an agreement.
We must speak--but not here. Return to the fighting pits. Disarm the remote detonation switch.
To destroy the Kintan Kings, we must topple the Mountain.
We need to find the Mountain. Did you learn anything at the slave market?
We must set fire to all who would enslave others! Er, I mean we must punish them.
Those combat implants you recovered were extremely valuable. You have my gratitude.
Those Nikto scum--er, criminals--must not be allowed to steal the Republic's property.
The Republic needs more heroes like you.
Ambassador Averdon is very agitated. I do not blame him.
Apologies, but I'm conferring with Ambassador Averdon on an important matter.
Welcome to my mercantile exchange. I have many fine things for you.
